title: The Young Person's Guide to Getting Their Ball Back
Dodger, Bonzo and the Rest
description: When they overhear that their children's home may be closed, the youngsters hatch a series of plans, not all totally above board, to raise money to keep it open.

title: The Old Firm: Two for Starters
The Young Person's Guide to Going Backwards in the World
Jessie's Place
description: A girl from a snobbish middle class family is desperate to break free, and ends up forging an unlikely friendship with a younger working class boy.

title: Frankie's Hat
description: Sonia travels from London to Oxford to make a Birthday visit to her sister Frankie who has moved away and started a family. But Frankie takes the opportunity to make up for her lost youth, much to the younger girl's distaste.

title: The Horrible Story
description: Three boys are determined to try out the tent which their uncle has sent them from Australia as a 3-month late Christmas present. But will they last the night camped in the garden?

title: My Friend Julie
description: A story told entirely in song of the difficult friendship between two teenage girls who both love the same boy.

title: Blackbird Singing in the Dead of Night
description: Kim, a girl rendered deaf by an accident, has to return to the children's ward for a second time when the first operation fails. Whilst there, she befriends a boy who is immature on the outside, but has a good heart.

title: Back to Front
description: We all know that mirrors take real life and reflect it back to us the other way. But what if the mirror's world goes beyond the pane of glass?
